content.raw: Does their existence or non-existence of these components impact which parts of `ign-rendering` will get built? Or have some impact on *how* `ign-rendering` gets built? If so, the [Components pull request](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/2) may be extremely relevant for `ign-rendering`. If not, then I'd be curious about why we're searching for these components of OGRE in the first place.
